title: Ranked 5s team LF support and mid
body: Our team needs a support and mid, if you think you're interested just add me in game: WQLFY.

replies.body: Age: 20 Availability: varies but quite often, most nights. G5 last season, still in initiation for this season, main mid but mostly fill in ranked. Active and keen for a team willing to learn through experience and be active (main problem ive had in teams is getting 5 people on at once). Mostly counter pick or choose for team comp character wise, can play most champs well, have a few favourites. Have both skype and TS and send a friend request. Cant wait to meet everyone and dont mind playing norms to start until we get used to each others play styles. ~ DemonzMercy ~ OCE server
tried to add you, instantly declined, several times..? unsure of why?
3 others already did, I'll make room. Try again.

Age: 18
Role: support
top 3 picks for support: {{champion:412}}  {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:12}} (in that order)
commutation ([Y]/N): team speech, Skype
availability: after school most days, Wednesdays all day, weekends
Note: 9 time out of 10 i'm free but just give me a few days notice for games
IGN : DuSt235
